title: Car Dealership
description: A car service booking platform that allows users to find nearby service centers and book appointments.

title: Weather App
description: A real-time weather forecasting app providing current conditions, hourly updates, and extended forecasts for any location.

title: Todo
description: A simple and efficient task management app to organize, prioritize, and track your daily tasks and to-dos.

title: Password Generator
description: A secure password generator that creates strong, random passwords with customizable options for length, numbers, and special characters.

title: Stock Market App
description: A real-time stock and cryptocurrency tracker that provides up-to-date prices and trends for various stocks and cryptocurrencies.
